`YOUR GOALS SHOULD SCARE YOU A LITTLE AND EXCITE YOU A LOT.`
`THEY WILL`` SAY YOU JUST GOT LUCKY, BUT I`` WOULD SAY IT'S CONSISTENCY.`
`YOUR LAZINESS IS DISRESPECTFUL FOR THE PEOPLE WHO BELIEVE IN YOU.`
`TEMPTATION TO GIVE UP IS GREATEST BEFORE YOU'RE ABOUT TO SUCCEED.`
`MAKING IT IS EASY, MAINTAINING IT IS HARD.`
`DON’T BURN YOUR OPPORTUNITIES FOR A TEMPORARY COMFORT.`
`YOU LEARN NOTHING FROM LIFE IF YOU THINK YOU’RE RIGHT ALL THE TIME.`
